3: After defeating the Corrupted, you finally join the crowd in the stone house.
But strangely, everyone is focused on chanting something unintelligible and no one is bothered by your intrusion.
Your group soon reaches the stone tablet.
I can't. It's nothing like any of the known languages.
Well, to be precise... it has a 6.12% similarity to cuneiform, but that's not much to go on.
And the people here are acting pretty weird.
Their physiological functions are normal, but their manner is lifeless and robotic.
They could have been brainwashed or hypnotized.

2: Can we get them back to normal?

3: Maybe, but I don't think we have time for that.
Waves of Corrupted signals are closing in on us.
